In this work, Fleetwood, a former Sergeant-Major in the 4th U.S. Colored Troops, documents the significant yet often overlooked roles played by Black soldiers in American history. Fleetwood emphasizes moments of valor, such as the courageous actions of Black troops at Fort Wagner and other critical battles during the Civil War.
